parse.title: List of flags of the Democratic Republic of the Congo

text.*:
Wikimedia Commons has media related to Flags of the Democratic Republic of the Congo.

This is a list of flags used by the Democratic Republic of the Congo and its antecedents.

Contents

  • 1 National
  • 2 Historical
    • 2.1 Colonial period
    • 2.2 Republic of the Congo and the Congo Crisis
    • 2.3 Zaire
    • 2.4 Democratic Republic of the Congo
  • 3 Presidential
  • 4 Sub-national

National[edit]

Flag Date Use Description
2006–present Flag of the Democratic Republic of the Congo Sky blue flag, adorned with a yellow star in the upper left canton and cut diagonally by a red stripe with a thin yellow frame.

Historical[edit]

Colonial period[edit]

Flag Date Use Description
1885–1908
1908–1960		 Flag of the Congo Free State
(Previously of the International African Association)
Flag of Belgian Congo		 A yellow five-pointed flag on a blue background.
1936-1960 Standard of the Governor-General of the Belgian Congo Flag of the Belgian Congo superimposed on the top left of the Flag of Belgium
1895-1908 Flag of the Batetela Rebels

Republic of the Congo and the Congo Crisis[edit]

Flag Date Use Description
1960-1963 Flag of Republic of the Congo (Léopoldville)
1963-1966 Flag of Democratic Republic of the Congo
1966-1971 Flag of Democratic Republic of the Congo The red bend sinister was changed to a reduced bend sinister.
1960-1961 Flag of the South Kasai
1960-1963 Flag of the State of Katanga

Zaire[edit]

Flag Date Use Description
1971-1997 Flag of Zaire

Democratic Republic of the Congo[edit]

Flag Date Use Description
1997-2003 Flag of the Democratic Republic of the Congo
2003-2006 Flag of the Democratic Republic of the Congo
2006–present Flag of the Democratic Republic of the Congo Sky blue flag, adorned with a yellow star in the upper left canton and cut diagonally by a red stripe with a thin yellow frame.

Presidential[edit]

Flag Date Use Description
? Flag of the President of the Democratic Republic of the Congo National flag with the addition of the inscription "Le President"

Sub-national[edit]

Flag Date Use Description
? Flag of Kinshasa
